alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 9:20PM EDT until July 18 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SOMERSET AND WEST CENTRAL FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 919 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rangeley, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Eustis, Rangeley, Phillips, Weld, Dallas Plantation, Coplin Plantation, Lang, Davis, Sandy River Plantation, Madrid, Rangeley Plantation, Redington and Tim Pond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
